name: Shuttle Pug
description:
An action game about regaining control of your spaceship, made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Captain Puggers was just on a solo trip to Planet Tennisballs, when suddenly, things took an unexpected twist, now the ship is out of control and you must manually repair everything on board and restore normality before the imminent collision!

4 difficulty modes and a high-score, compete for the best time to save Captain Puggers!

Known Issues:

In the rush of the time limit, turns out there's a slight issue - the 4th, unlockable difficulty mode is actually not possible to complete - some prize, huh?

Also, your high score on the "Chill" difficulty doesn't show correctly on the menu, this was just a error reading the correct value. Both of these issues have no issue with the game-play itself and are already fixed and ready for the post-jam update!
